name: Patato Escape
description:
Help a potato to reach his freedom (the trash can) !

Controls :
- W, A, S, D / Z, Q, S, D : potato movement
- Space : Jump
- M : ShutUpPotato! mod
- Mouse : camera control
- Space : jump

Tips:
Spam space (and try to move) to get out of the pot !

Credits:
- STUDIO KROKIDANA - Kitchen Creation Kit (note: i've made the vegetables and the pot myself)
- Pure Evil Studio - Water Effect Fits For Lowpoly Style
- InspectorJ - Bubbling, Large, A.wav
- AShamaluevMusic - Mission - Epic Blockbuster Background Music / Action Cinematic Music Trailer

Frreeddoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooomm !!
